projects: [{"title":"Correlation Between Emotional Intelligence and Positive Approach Towards Life","start_date":"Nov 2017","description":"‚Ä¢Collected data from the survey of IIT Kharagpur students with the help of an online questionnaire containing 5-6 MCQ questions on Self and Social factors‚Ä¢Built the best exponential model for Success, Failure and Motivation scores with the parameters Self Awareness, Self Management, and Social Awareness‚Ä¢Distinct weight values were obtained for each score where the rate of increase of each score can be monitored manually to determine the correlation"},{"title":"Emotion Detection","start_date":"Oct 2019","description":"‚Ä¢Worked on a Emotion Detection algorithm through speech pattern processing with the audio features extraction using LibROSA library in python‚Ä¢The dataset included around 1500 audio file input from 24 actors (12 male, 12 female) where these actors recorded short audios in 8 different emotions‚Ä¢Mel-frequency cepstrum coefficients (MFCCs) extracted from the audio files were used as an input to the Convolutional Network for classification"},{"title":"Chess Board Detection","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"‚Ä¢Built an algorithm that is capable of recognizing chessboard and locate the squares and detect chess pieces from an image for the next best move‚Ä¢For piece recognition used R-CNN to train a robust classifier to work on different kinds of chess board pieces and Stockfish-9 for the possible best move‚Ä¢The method performed better on different kinds of pieces as compared to a SIFT based classifier post-application of image preprocessing methods"}]
